alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Marion County through 900 PM EDT... At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Weir, or 8 miles northwest of The Villages, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Weirsdale, Sparr, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff, Silver Springs Shores and Lake Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam
